Title: Two Piece Illusion Bodice Evening Dress with Sweeping Train

Featured-image: CK40-black-two-piece-illusion-bodice-evening-dress-with-sweeping-train_p.jpg

----

Description: An elegant two piece gown with a sweeping train. The illusion bodice is sexy and appears to only have sparkling floral designs covering the  bust and edging the neckline and back. An oval cutout in the back accents the bodice. The floor length skirt is trimmed with beading at the waistline and features a high split in the front.
